verses.verse: Am <WG1510> I not<WG3756> an apostle?<WG652> am<WG1510> I not<WG3756> free?<WG1658> have I not<WG3780> seen<WG3708> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> our<WG2257> Lord?<WG2962> are<WG2075> not<WG3756> ye<WG5210> my<WG3450> work<WG2041> in<WG1722> the Lord?<WG2962>

If <WG1487> I be<WG1510> not<WG3756> an apostle<WG652> unto others,<WG243> yet<WG235> doubtless<WG1065> I am<WG1510> to you:<WG5213> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> seal<WG4973> of mine<WG1699> apostleship<WG651> are<WG2075> ye<WG5210> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>
Mine <WG1699> answer<WG627> to them that do examine<WG350> me<WG1691> is<WG2076> this,<WG3778>
Have <WG2192> we not<WG3378> power<WG1849> to eat<WG5315> and<WG2532> to drink?<WG4095>

Have <WG2192> we not<WG3378> power<WG1849> to lead about<WG4013> a sister,<WG79> a wife,<WG1135> as well as<WG5613> <WG2532> other<WG3062> apostles,<WG652> and<WG2532> as the<WG3588> brethren<WG80> of the<WG3588> Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> Cephas?<WG2786>
Or <WG2228> I<WG1473> only<WG3441> and<WG2532> Barnabas,<WG921> have<WG2192> not<WG3756> we power<WG1849> to forbear working?<WG2038> <WG3361>

Who <WG5101> goeth a warfare<WG4754> any time<WG4218> at his own<WG2398> charges?<WG3800> who<WG5101> planteth<WG5452> a vineyard,<WG290> and<WG2532> eateth<WG2068> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> fruit<WG2590> thereof?<WG848> or<WG2228> who<WG5101> feedeth<WG4165> a flock,<WG4167> and<WG2532> eateth<WG2068> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> milk<WG1051> of the<WG3588> flock?<WG4167>
Say <WG2980> I these things<WG5023> <WG3361> as<WG2596> a man?<WG444> or<WG2228> saith<WG3004> not<WG3780> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> the same<WG5023> also?<WG2532>

For <WG1063> it is written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> of Moses,<WG3475> Thou shalt not<WG3756> muzzle<WG5392> the mouth of the ox<WG1016> that treadeth out the corn.<WG248> Doth<WG3361> God<WG2316> take care<WG3199> for oxen?<WG1016>

Or <WG2228> saith<WG3004> he it altogether<WG3843> for our sakes?<WG1223> <WG2248> For our sakes,<WG1223> <WG2248> no doubt,<WG1063> this is written:<WG1125> that<WG3754> he that ploweth<WG722> should<WG3784> plow<WG722> in<WG1909> hope;<WG1680> and<WG2532> that he that thresheth<WG248> in<WG1909> hope<WG1680> should be partaker<WG3348> of his<WG848> hope.<WG1680>
If <WG1487> we<WG2249> have sown<WG4687> unto you<WG5213> spiritual things,<WG4152> is it a great thing<WG3173> if<WG1487> we<WG2249> shall reap<WG2325> your<WG5216> carnal things?<WG4559>

If <WG1487> others<WG243> be partakers<WG3348> of this power<WG1849> over you,<WG5216> are not<WG3756> we<WG2249> rather?<WG3123> Nevertheless<WG235> we have not<WG3756> used<WG5530> this<WG5026> power;<WG1849> but<WG235> suffer<WG4722> all things,<WG3956> lest<WG3363> we should hinder<WG1325> <WG5100> <WG1464> the<WG3588> gospel<WG2098> of Christ.<WG5547>

Do ye not<WG3756> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> they which minister<WG2038> about holy things<WG2413> live<WG2068> of the things of<WG1537> the<WG3588> temple?<WG2411> and they which wait<WG4332> at the<WG3588> altar<WG2379> are partakers with<WG4829> the<WG3588> altar?<WG2379>
Even <WG2532> so<WG3779> hath the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> ordained<WG1299> that they which preach<WG2605> the<WG3588> gospel<WG2098> should live<WG2198> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> gospel.<WG2098>

But <WG1161> I<WG1473> have used<WG5530> none<WG3762> of these things:<WG5130> neither<WG1161> <WG3756> have I written<WG1125> these things,<WG5023> that<WG2443> it should be so<WG3779> done<WG1096> unto<WG1722> me:<WG1698> for<WG1063> it were better<WG2570> for me<WG3427> to<WG3123> die,<WG599> than<WG2228> that<WG2443> any man<WG5100> should make my glorying void.<WG2758> <WG3450> <WG2745>

For <WG1063> though<WG1437> I preach the gospel,<WG2097> I<WG3427> have<WG2076> nothing<WG3756> to glory of:<WG2745> for<WG1063> necessity<WG318> is laid upon<WG1945> me;<WG3427> yea,<WG1161> woe<WG3759> is<WG2076> unto me,<WG3427> if<WG1437> I preach not the gospel!<WG2097> <WG3361>

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> I do<WG4238> this thing<WG5124> willingly,<WG1635> I have<WG2192> a reward:<WG3408> but<WG1161> if<WG1487> against my will,<WG210> a dispensation<WG3622> of the gospel is committed<WG4100> unto me.

What <WG5101> is<WG2076> my<WG3427> reward<WG3408> then?<WG3767> Verily that,<WG2443> when I preach the gospel,<WG2097> I may make<WG5087> the<WG3588> gospel<WG2098> of Christ<WG5547> without charge,<WG77> that I abuse<WG2710> not<WG3361> my<WG3450> power<WG1849> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> gospel.<WG2098>

For <WG1063> though I be<WG5607> free<WG1658> from<WG1537> all<WG3956> men, yet have I made myself servant<WG1402> <WG1683> unto all,<WG3956> that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> the<WG3588> more.<WG4119>

And <WG2532> unto the<WG3588> Jews<WG2453> I became<WG1096> as<WG5613> a Jew,<WG2453> that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> the Jews;<WG2453> to them<WG3588> that are under<WG5259> the law,<WG3551> as<WG5613> under<WG5259> the law,<WG3551> that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> them<WG3588> that are under<WG5259> the law;<WG3551>

To them that are without law,<WG459> as<WG5613> without law,<WG459> (being<WG5607> not<WG3361> without law<WG459> to God,<WG2316> but<WG235> under the law<WG1772> to Christ,)<WG5547> that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> them that are without law.<WG459>

To the<WG3588> weak<WG772> became<WG1096> I as<WG5613> weak,<WG772> that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> the<WG3588> weak:<WG772> I am made<WG1096> all things<WG3956> to all<WG3956> men, that<WG2443> I might by all means<WG3843> save<WG4982> some.<WG5100>
And <WG1161> this<WG5124> I do<WG4160> for the gospel's sake,<WG1223> <WG3588> <WG2098> that<WG2443> I might be<WG1096> partaker thereof with<WG4791> <WG846> you.

Know <WG1492> ye not<WG3756> that<WG3754> they which run<WG5143> in<WG1722> a race<WG4712> run<WG5143> all,<WG3956> <WG3303> but<WG1161> one<WG1520> receiveth<WG2983> the<WG3588> prize?<WG1017> So<WG3779> run,<WG5143> that<WG2443> ye may obtain.<WG2638>

And <WG1161> every man<WG3956> that striveth for the mastery<WG75> is temperate<WG1467> in all things.<WG3956> Now<WG3767> they<WG1565> do it<WG3303> to<WG2443> obtain<WG2983> a corruptible<WG5349> crown;<WG4735> but<WG1161> we<WG2249> an incorruptible.<WG862>
I <WG1473> therefore<WG5106> so<WG3779> run,<WG5143> not<WG3756> as<WG5613> uncertainly;<WG84> so<WG3779> fight<WG4438> I, not<WG3756> as<WG5613> one that beateth<WG1194> the air: <WG109>

But <WG235> I keep under<WG5299> my<WG3450> body,<WG4983> and<WG2532> bring it into subjection:<WG1396> lest that by any means,<WG3381> when I have preached<WG2784> to others,<WG243> I myself<WG848> should be<WG1096> a castaway.<WG96>
